data.what_is: Applied Software Technology, Inc. is a premier design technology firm serving the AEC, ENI and Manufacturing industries.
data.product_description: Applied Software Technology, Inc. is a premier design technology firm serving the AEC, ENI and Manufacturing industries.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best place to get Autodesk software
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Applied Software helped with:
I have worked with ASTI for the past 10 years. Every time I have worked with ASTI they have been nothing but helpful!

What do you like best about Applied Software?
They have great customer service! If I call with an issue it takes minutes for them to get back to me. They also have great software that helps make my job easier.

What do you dislike about Applied Software?
There is not a downside of using ASTI they have been helpful every step of the way.

Recommendations to others considering Applied Software:
If you are looking for a new provider of your Autodesk software I would give ASTI a call! They are helpful every step of the way.

What problems is Applied Software solving and how is that benefiting you?
Currently, ASTI is helping us with all of our Autodesk software and training and we are working with them on BlueBeam.

initial_reviews.review_title: Applied Software jump started our switch to Fabrication in Revit
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Applied Software helped with:
When we moved to Revit we needed to find a partner that was able to provide the fabrication content and database management tools that would make us successful - we found that the Value Pack and the continuing services that ASTI offers were the correct choice for our company.

What do you like best about Applied Software?
I appreciate the timely responses and involvement that the team at ASTI maintains. When I need an answer they are readily available.

What do you dislike about Applied Software?
I would like to see the development of a web based application that provides spooling and BOM data.
